definition: to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: Falling in love is the paradigmatic example of  an involuntary  life-affecting desire.
sentences.chinese: 坠入爱河是一个欲望不由自主影响人生的经典案例。

sentences.english: The dwarf could not help but think of Joffrey.
sentences.chinese: 侏儒不由自主想起了乔佛里。

sentences.english: I saw this picture and couldn't resist posting it.
sentences.chinese: 我看到这张图片便不由自主地把它张贴出来。

sentences.english: I snorted a few mouthfuls of fresh air, but also puts on a minor involuntarily.
sentences.chinese: 我吸了几口新鲜空气，又不由自主地哼起了小调。

sentences.english: Bink wondered briefly about this, as he often did.
sentences.chinese: 宾克不由自主地想起这些事来，他经常这样。

sentences.english: Young people are not open the door of moment, in spite of a call.
sentences.chinese: 年轻人没有门打开的瞬间，不由自主地发出怪叫。

sentences.english: He noticed her involuntary gesture, and smiled.
sentences.chinese: 他注意到她那不由自主的姿势，微微一笑。

sentences.english: Involuntarily the echoes are gently about the ear.
sentences.chinese: 这种不由自主的回音轻轻的荡漾在耳际。

sentences.english: Darwin described the 'inhibition hypothesis' where emotions involuntarily leak out.
sentences.chinese: 达尔文在“抑郁假说”中认为情感会不由自主地流露。

sentences.english: I loved the world despite myself.
sentences.chinese: 我不由自主地爱这个世界。

sentences.english: But yes, you do evaluate other people's work of course.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我是在不由自主地评价别人的工作。

sentences.english: Trina's affection for her "old bear" grew in spite of herself.
sentences.chinese: 屈丽娜就不由自主的慢慢爱起她的“老狗熊”来了。

sentences.english: I involuntarily dozen cringe, walk alone.
sentences.chinese: 我不由自主的打了个哆嗦，独自行走。

sentences.english: I get exciting by bethink of this.
sentences.chinese: 呵呵，想到这里又不由自主的兴奋起来。

sentences.english: I'm sure you cannot help being good-hearted .
sentences.chinese: 我想你是不由自主地发善心。

sentences.english: Thought of here, young people's eyes involuntarily drips down two lines of clear tears.
sentences.chinese: 想到这里，年轻人的眼中不由自主地淌下两行清泪来。

definition: variant of 戰慄|战栗[zhan4 li4]
to agree by chance (idiom); taking the same action without prior consultation
to tremble/to shiver/uncontrolled shaking of the body
